sistema

Class ApplicazioneAmministratoreSistema

  • java.lang.Object
    • sistema.Applicazione
      • sistema.ApplicazioneAmministratoreSistema

  • public class ApplicazioneAmministratoreSistema
extends Applicazione
    ApplicazioneAmministratoreSistema.java

    This class represents the Applicazione Amministratore Sistema, extends Applicazione.java. It is characterized by the following attributes: admin (the administrator of the system), listaGestori (HashMap containing all the GestoreCinema registered in the system), mapCinema (HashMap containing a list of cinema for each GestoreCinema registered in the system), listaFilm (HashMap containing all the film of the Circuito Cinema).

    Author:
    Sara Martino

        public boolean resetApplication()
        Clears all the lists/maps of this app. It is useful to reset the system

        Returns false if the administrator is not logged.

        Returns:
        true if the reset is successful, false otherwise

            java.lang.String password)
        Description copied from class: Applicazione
        Logs in the user corresponding to the specified username.

        Returns false if username or password are null, if there is no user with this username, if the password is wrong or if the user is already logged.

        Returns:

      • getRegisteredGestoreCinema

        public static GestoreCinema getRegisteredGestoreCinema(java.lang.String usernameGestoreCinema)
        Returns the GestoreCinema specified by the username passed as input.

        Returns null if there are no registered managers with the specified username.

        Parameters:
        usernameGestoreCinema - The username of the GestoreCinema
        Returns:
        The GestoreCinema if it is present, null otherwise

      • registraNuovoGestoreCinema

        public boolean registraNuovoGestoreCinema(java.lang.String nome,
                                 java.lang.String cognome,
                                 java.lang.String codiceFiscale,
                                 java.util.Calendar dataNascita,
                                 java.lang.String email)
        Adds a new GestoreCinema to the list of managers of the Circuito Cinema.

        Returns false if the AmministratoreSistema is not logged or if there is already a GestoreCinema with the same fiscal code.

        Parameters:
        nome - The name of the new manager
        cognome - The surname of the new manager
        codiceFiscale - The fiscal code of the new manager
        dataNascita - The date of birth of the new manager
        email - The email of the new manager
        Returns:
        true if the new manager is added, false otherwise

      • removeGestoreCinema

        public boolean removeGestoreCinema(java.lang.String usernameGestoreCinema)
        Removes the GestoreCinema specified by the username passed as input from the list of managers of the Circuito Cinema.

        Returns false if the AmministratoreSistema is not logged or if the username is not valid.

        Parameters:
        usernameGestoreCinema - The username of the manager
        Returns:
        true if the manager is removed, false otherwise

        public boolean printAllManagers()
        Prints the info of each registered Gestore Cinema.

        Returns false if the Amministratore Sistema is not registered and logged or if the list of room is empty.

        Returns:
        true if the operation has been successful, false otherwise

      • modifyPasswordGestoreCinema

        public boolean modifyPasswordGestoreCinema(java.lang.String usernameGestoreCinema,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        Modifies a GestoreCinema of the list of managers of the Circuito Cinema.

        Returns false if the AmministratoreSistema is not logged, if the username is not valid or if the password is not correctly formatted (minimum 4 characters, no blank space).

        Parameters:
        usernameGestoreCinema - The username of the manager
        password - The new password of the manager
        Returns:
        true if the password of the manager is modified, false otherwise

      • addNewCinema

        public boolean addNewCinema(java.lang.String usernameGestoreCinema,
                   Cinema cinema)
        Adds a new Cinema to the list of Cinema of the specified GestoreCinema.

        Returns false if the AmministratoreSistema is not logged, if the GestoreCinema is not registered in the system, or if there is already a Cinema with the same name and address.

        Parameters:
        usernameGestoreCinema - The username of the GestoreCinema
        cinema - The new cinema
        Returns:
        true if the new cinema is added, false otherwise

      • removeCinema

        public boolean removeCinema(java.lang.String usernameGestoreCinema,
                   int cinemaId)
        Removes the cinema (specified by the id passed as input) from the list of the GestoreCinema (specified by the username passed as input).

        Returns false if this cinema does not exist in the list.

        Parameters:
        usernameGestoreCinema - The GestoreCinema
        cinemaId - The id of the cinema
        Returns:
        true if the cinema is removed, false otherwise

      • inserisciNuovoFilm

        public boolean inserisciNuovoFilm(java.lang.String id,
                         java.lang.String titolo,
                         java.lang.String regista,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> attori,
                         int durata,
                         int anno,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> genere,
                         java.lang.String casaDiProduzione,
                         java.lang.String trama,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tag)
        Adds a new film to the films list of the Circuito Cinema.

        Returns false if the AmministratoreSistema is not logged or if there is already a film with the same id.

        Parameters:
        id - An unique id identifying the film For example EIDR Entertainment Identifier Register
        titolo - The title of the film
        regista - The director of the film
        attori - A list containing the main actors of the film
        durata - The duration of the film
        anno - The year of the film
        genere - A list of the genres of the film
        casaDiProduzione - The production company
        trama - The plot of the film
        tag - A list of tag that are pertinent to the film
        Returns:
        true if the new film is added, false otherwise

      • eliminaFilm

        public boolean eliminaFilm(java.lang.String idFilm)
        Removes a film from the films list of the cinema of the Circuito Cinema.

        Returns false if the AmministratoreSistema is not logged or if there is no film with the specified id.

        Parameters:
        idFilm - The id of the film
        Returns:
        true if the film is removed, false otherwise

        public static ListaCinemaIterator getListaCinemaIterator(java.lang.String usernameGestoreCinema)

        Parameters:

      • printAllFilm

        public static boolean printAllFilm()
        Prints the base info of each film in the films list.

        Returns false if the list of films is empty.

        Returns:
        true if there is at least one film in the list, false otherwise

      • printSchedaFilm

        public static boolean printSchedaFilm(java.lang.String filmId)
        Prints all info (Scheda Film) of the film corresponding to the id passed as input.

        Returns false if there is no film corresponding to this id.

        Parameters:
        filmId - The id of the desired film
        Returns:
        true if there is the film that corresponds to this id, false otherwise.

      • cercaFilmPerTitolo

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Film> cercaFilmPerTitolo(java.lang.String param)
        Searches a films by title (or part of it) in the list of films.

        If no film matches the search criteria, it returns an empty list; the return may not be null.

        Parameters:
        param - Title (or part of it) to search for
        Returns:
        The list of films resulting from the search if present, an empty list otherwise

      • cercaFilmPerAnno

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Film> cercaFilmPerAnno(int param)
        Searches a films by year in the list of films.

        If no film matches the search criteria, it returns an empty list; the return may not be null.

        Parameters:
        param - Year to search for
        Returns:
        The list of films resulting from the search if present, an empty list otherwise

      • cercaFilmPerGenere

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Film> cercaFilmPerGenere(java.lang.String param)
        Searches a films by genre (only one) in the list of films.

        If no film matches the search criteria, it returns an empty list; the return may not be null.

        Parameters:
        param - Genre to search for
        Returns:
        The list of films resulting from the search if present, an empty list otherwise

        Returns:
        The list of films resulting from the search if present, an empty list otherwise

      • cercaFilmPerTag

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Film> cercaFilmPerTag(java.lang.String param)
        Searches a films by tags (also more than one) in the list of films.

        If no film matches the search criteria, it returns an empty list; the return may not be null.

        Parameters:
        param - Tags to search for
        Returns:
        The list of films resulting from the search if present, an empty list otherwise

      • cercaFilmPerId

        public static Film cercaFilmPerId(java.lang.String param)
        Searches a films by id in the list of films.

        If no film matches the search criteria, it returns null.

        Parameters:
        param - Id to search for
        Returns:
        The film resulting from the search if present, null otherwise

      • sendEmail

        public void sendEmail(java.lang.String email,
             java.lang.Object... arguments)
        Send a mail to the specified email address passed an input.

        In this first implementation this function is not implemented.

        Parameters:
        email - The email address of the recipient
        arguments - An array of objects to be used to create the mail
